## About CoffeeCup
CoffeeCup Software provides a versatile suite of tools tailored for web designers and developers of all skill levels. At its core is a commitment to bridging the gap between visual design and hand-coded precision. The software suite includes dedicated applications for visual site building, robust HTML and CSS editing, responsive design testing, and form creation, allowing users to choose the right tool for their workflow. Whether you're a freelancer building client sites, a marketer creating landing pages, or a developer needing a focused coding environment, CoffeeCup offers professional-grade features in an accessible package. Its long-standing reputation is built on empowering users to create standards-compliant, beautiful websites efficiently.

The platform stands out by offering both What-You-See-Is-What-You-Get (WYSIWYG) design capabilities and deep code-level access. This dual approach means you can start a project visually, then dive into the code to fine-tune performance, accessibility, or add custom functionality. Tools like the Responsive Site Designer and the HTML Editor are built to work together, ensuring a smooth transition from concept to deployment. For teams and individuals who value clean code, visual feedback, and a streamlined workflow without subscription fees, CoffeeCup presents a compelling, all-in-one solution for the entire website creation process.

## ‚ú® CoffeeCup Advantages
‚úî **Flexible Workflow**: Switch seamlessly between visual design and code editing within a unified environment.
‚úî **No Subscription Model**: Own your software outright with a perpetual license and free updates during the version cycle.
‚úî **Built for Standards**: Generate clean, semantic HTML and CSS that adheres to modern web standards for better SEO and accessibility.

## ‚öôÔ∏è System Requirements
*   **Processor**: 1 GHz 64-bit processor or faster.
*   **Memory**: 4 GB RAM minimum (8 GB recommended for working with larger projects).
*   **Storage**: 1 GB of available disk space.
*   **Display**: Screen resolution of 1280x768 or higher.
*   **System**: Latest version of your host operating system.

## üìà Use Cases
*   **Web Designers & Agencies**: Rapidly prototype and build custom, responsive websites for clients with visual tools and code export.
*   **Front-End Developers**: Use the advanced code editor and CSS tools for efficient crafting and debugging of website layouts.
*   **Marketing & Content Teams**: Create and manage landing pages, forms, and microsites without deep technical knowledge.
